Waltham.Nelson F. Libby House: The Nelson F. Libby House is a historic house at 147–149 Weston Street in Waltham, Massachusetts. This 2-1/2 story wood frame house was built in 1891 by Nelson Libby, who owned a woodworking firm that probably manufactured the architectural parts used in its construction. It is an imposing Queen Anne Victorian, with the characteristic array of projecting gables and porches, as well as a turret.
